crawlers module¶

This is a simple module composed just by two classes:

  • Reddit class;
  • RedditPrinter class.

crawlers.Reddit class¶

class crawlers.Reddit(subredd)¶

Class for subreddit crawlers.

subredd¶

str – The name of the subreddit.

crawlers()¶

Search informations about the subreddit subredd, retorning informations about the trending threads.

Returns:In case of some error, returns a None object. In success, returns a list of dictionaries. The dictionaries are concerning to each trending thread found, sorted by score (descending order). Their keys values are:
  • title - title of the thread.
  • ups - number of up votes of the thread.
  • downs - number of down votes of the thread.
  • num_comments - number of comments of the thread.
  • over_18 - boolean indicating if is a 18+ thread.
  • thread_url - url to the comments of the thread.
  • link_url - url of the subject of the thread.
Return type:list | None
filter_18 = False¶

Filter 18+ threads.

getSubredd()¶

Returns the subredd atribute value

Returns:the value of subredd atribute.
Return type:str
getSubreddUrl()¶

Returns the subreddit url.

Returns:Subreddit URL.
Return type:str
limit = 25¶

Limit of threads to sweep inside each subreddit.

min_upvotes = 5000¶

Min of upvotes to be considerated a trending thread.

verbose = True¶

Print error messages.

crawlers.RedditPrinter class¶

class crawlers.RedditPrinter(subredds, limit=25, min_upvotes=5000, filter_18=False)¶

Class of Reddit Crawlers Printer.

subredds¶

list – An array of strings (subrreds).

limit¶

int, optional – Limit of threads to sweep inside each subreddit.

min_upvotes¶

int, optional – Min of upvotes to be considerated a trending thread.

filter_18¶

bool, optional – Filter 18+ threads.

getCrawlers()¶

Returns a printable string of the trending threads (crawlers) found for the subredds attribute.

Returns:printable string of trending threads
Return type:str
printCrawlers()¶

Prints the trending threads (crawlers) found for the subredds attribute
